AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that will be responsible for the new Address resource.

AutoCorrectAddress.description: Whether we should automatically correct the address. Can be: `true` or `false` and the default is `true`. If empty or `true`, we will correct the address you provide if necessary. If `false`, we won't alter the address you provide.

City.description: The city of the new address.

CustomerName.description: The name to associate with the new address.

EmergencyEnabled.description: Whether to enable emergency calling on the new address. Can be: `true` or `false`.

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the new address. It can be up to 64 characters long.

IsoCountry.description: The ISO country code of the new address.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the new address.

Region.description: The state or region of the new address.

Street.description: The number and street address of the new address.

StreetSecondary.description: The additional number and street address of the address.
